p: Rolim et al. (2017) evaluated the toxicity (mice erythrocytes, acute preclinical and genotoxicity) of the essential oil from Mesosphaerum sidifolium and its main component, fenchone ( 253). The results demonstrated that the essential oil induced weight loss, but presented no positive results in hematological, biochemical or histological parameters. On the other hand, fenchone ( 253) induced a decrease of hepatic enzymes, suggesting liver damage which could be a hindrance in the use of this compound in therapeutics.
